title: How can a person on the principle evaluate his principles? - Quora

response.answer_text: How to evaluate principles - was a question which a 13 century Buddhist reformer, Nichiren answered by: what is the Actual Proof of your principle, when applied to reality. The criterion of the “Actual Proof” is like in scientific examination of a new theory (or a suggested principle of thought). The only way to evaluate the validity of a thought is to have tests. If the results of offered concepts coincide with reality and produce beneficial results of value to people - then this is the proper criterion to evaluate principles of mind. Principles are matters of beliefs or faith. How to evaluate faith? By application and seeing the results it creates in reality of human society: Buddhist Concept: Faith is Found in Daily Life –
